verbs.description: [ARG2: sweep of giants] [V: jumpstarted] [ARG1: dodgers postseason push] the dodgers have nice momentum heading into the national league championship series and the giants can say they played a role fresh off a division series smackdown of the braves the dodgers have won seven of eight while outscoring opponents 53 - 17 and it all started two friday nights ago when madison bumgarner was out - pitched by hyun - jin ryu the dodgers arrived in san francisco to conclude their regular season after losing consecutive games in arizona and one more loss in retrospect would have turned them into a wild - card team but the dodgers won the opener and scored 25 times saturday and sunday to complete a sweep and force a one - game tiebreaker with the rockies for the division title which the dodgers won giants dodgers giants band los angeles dodgers
